author: Edward D. Chang
title: Italy’s Health Care is in Triage, as the EU Sits on Its Hands
description: A journalist from Langosco is not optimistic: “Unfortunately, there are still people who don’t stay home." The post Italy’s Health Care is in Triage, as the EU Sits on Its Hands appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
A journalist from Langosco is not optimistic: Unfortunately, there are still people who dont stay home."It was the last weekend of February when Dario Leone realized matters had taken a turn for the worse.
